subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
Automobile Safety Features and Defects
Deaths (Fatalities)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Justin Wilson, who died of injuries stemming from an accident at Pocono Raceway, had helped investigate the 2011 death of his friend Dan Wheldon in a Las Vegas race.
snippet: Justin Wilson, who died of injuries stemming from an accident at Pocono Raceway, had helped investigate the 2011 death of his friend Dan Wheldon in a Las Vegas race.
